  • Constructor Details

    • Keyboard

      public Keyboard()
      Default constructor for a Keyboard object which implements KeyListener. This constructor sets two boolean array lists which 256 values which enables key support for most key types needed in this practical.

  • Method Details

    • isPressed

      public boolean isPressed(int key)
      A simple getter method which takes a specific key and returns whether it has been pressed or not.
      Parameters:
      key - - A given key on the keyboard.
      Returns:
      - A boolean value denoting whether key has been pressed.

    • isClicked

      public boolean isClicked(int key)
      A simple getter method which takes a specific key and returns whether it has been clicked or not.
      Parameters:
      key - - A given key on the keyboard.
      Returns:
      - A boolean value denoting whether the key has been pressed.

    • isFlutter

      public boolean isFlutter(int key)
      A simple getter method which takes a specific key and returns whether the key object flutters or not.
      Parameters:
      key - - A given key on the Keyboard.
      Returns:
      - A boolean value denoting whether the key flutters.

      public boolean ctrl()
      ctrl() is a specific getter method which returns the state of if the ctrl key has been pressed.
      Returns:
      - A boolean value denoting whether the ctrl key has been pressed.

      public boolean alts()

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
      An override of KeyListener's keyPressed method. This method changes the boolean state of whether a key has been pressed or clicked depending on which key actually was altered.
      Specified by:
      keyPressed in interface KeyListener
      Parameters:
      e - the event to be processed

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
      An override of KeyListener's keyReleased method. This method changes the boolean state of whether a key has been released once it has been clicked or pressed.
      Specified by:
      keyReleased in interface KeyListener
      Parameters:
      e - the event to be processed

    • keyTyped

      public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e)
      An override of KeyListener's keyReleased method. This method changes the boolean state of whether a key has been typed i.e. continuously pressed down.
      Specified by:
      keyTyped in interface KeyListener
      Parameters:
      e - the event to be processed
